title: “Apparently I Stuttered: A Compute Optimizer Clarification”
summary:
There have been some noises about this week's newsletter issue in which I criticized the release of AWS Compute Optimizer offering RDS recommendations. Let me clarify my position and commentary on this feature announcement. 
The post “Apparently I Stuttered: A Compute Optimizer Clarification” appeared first on Last Week in AWS...

title: Tailscale achieves AWS Networking Competency
summary: We are delighted to announce that Tailscale has been awarded the AWS Networking Competency.  This recognition underscores Tailscale's deep expertise and proven success in delivering seamless, secure networking solutions on AWS

title: The beauty of blogging
summary:
I've been blogging for about 20 years (except for a couple of years off).  I love it.  There are several reasons why I like blogging:
WritingThere's something wonderful about seeing sentences grow, letter by letter, on a blank page...

title: Life is an Ocean
summary:
We must learn to:

Live in it
Live on it
Navigate it
Surf it
Swim in it
Sail on it
Dive in it
Understand it
Love it
Cherish it
Embrace it

But, above all, don’t drown in it

title: One Week of No Social Media
On the People We Meet Online
summary: When it comes to online interaction with other people, I couldn't tell you what exactly what I'm looking for because I don't have an exact goal.  I enjoy getting to know about the folks I interact with but it's not 100% necessary.  We can have those 30,000-foot conversations if that's

title: Re: Equally different
summary: A supportive message to a fellow blogger about the importance of community and the impact of writing, even when the response seems small

title: How I (Create Images for) My Blog Posts
